channel.title: CMU Chemical Engineering
channel.description: Papers by people in the Department of Chemical Engineering at CMU

item.title: DFT for Surface Segregation of Disordered FCC CuPdPt Alloys
item.description:
John R. Kitchin, Kirby Broderick, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4393587488
Data are split into train (<=35-atom slabs) and test (60-atom slabs) folders. Each folder contains a VASP calculation without the POTCAR. The slabs used are disordered AgAuCu, AuCuPd, or CuPdPt fcc alloys with a lattice constant set randomly between the largest and smallest experimental lattice constants of the constituent elements. The PBEsol functional is used with D3 dispersion corrections.
item.author: John R. Kitchin, Kirby Broderick

item.title: DFT for Surface Segregation of Disordered FCC CuPdPt Alloys

item.description:
Rohan Yuri Sanspeur, Javier Heras‐Domingo, John R. Kitchin, Zachary W. Ulissi, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2023. https://openalex.org/W4393572051
This repository houses electronic structure data and metadata generated as part of a computational chemistry case study, enabling full analysis of the paper "WhereWulff: A semi-autonomous workflow for systematic catalyst surface reactivity under reaction conditions" by Rohan Yuri Sanspeur, Javier Heras-Domingo, John R. Kitchin and Zachary Ulissi.

item.title: Causes And Importance Of New Particle Formation In The Present-Day And Pre-Industrial Atmospheres: Supporting Data
item.description:
Hamish Gordon, J. Kirkby, Urs Baltensperger, Federico Bianchi, Martin Breitenlechner, Joachim Curtius, António Dias, Josef Dommen, Neil M. Donahue, Eimear M. Dunne, Jonathan Duplissy, Sebastian Ehrhart, Richard C. Flagan, Carla Frege, Claudia Fuchs, Armin Hansel, C. R. Hoyle, Markku Kulmala, Andreas Kuerten, Katrianne Lehtipalo, В. С. Махмутов, Ugo Molteni, Matti Rissanen, Yuri Stozkhov, Jasmin Tröstl, Georgios Tsagkogeorgas, R. J. Wagner, Christina Williamson, Daniela Wimmer, Paul M. Winkler, Chao Yan, K. S. Carslaw, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2017. https://openalex.org/W4393744720
Data presented in the manuscript "Causes and importance of new particle formation in the present-day and pre-industrial atmospheres" currently in review. Particle number concentrations (files with initial word "CCN" or "N3") have units of particles per cubic centimetre, calculated at ambient temperature and pressure. Files with initial word "solar" have units of percent. Ion production rates have units ion pairs per cubic centimetre per second. The simulation data presented here was generated with the GLOMAP aerosol model, https://www.see.leeds.ac.uk/research/icas/research-themes/atmospheric-chemistry-and-aerosols/groups/aerosols-and-climate/the-glomap-model/ running on a T42 grid. The manuscript associated with this data was written using results from the CLOUD experiment at CERN, and the author list is a subset of the CLOUD collaboration.
item.author: Hamish Gordon, J. Kirkby, Urs Baltensperger, Federico Bianchi, Martin Breitenlechner, Joachim Curtius, António Dias, Josef Dommen, Neil M. Donahue, Eimear M. Махмутов, Ugo Molteni, Matti Rissanen, Yuri Stozkhov, Jasmin Tröstl, Georgios Tsagkogeorgas, R. J. Wagner, Christina Williamson, Daniela Wimmer, Paul M. Winkler, Chao Yan, K. S. Carslaw

item.title: Large Simulated Radiative Effects Of Smoke In The South-East Atlantic: Supporting Data
item.description:
Hamish Gordon, Paul Paul, Steve, . Mohit, Daniel, Adrian Adrian, : Ben, Annette, Masaru, Ken Ken, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2018. https://openalex.org/W4393419712
Datasets required to reproduce key figures from journal article acp-2018-305. Contact corresponding author for further information. In the filenames, 'BB' indicates simulation results with biomass burning aerosol, 'noBB' without, and 'noAA' are simulations without absorbing effects of aerosol. The 300x300 regional domain is a rotated pole centred on 10S, 12W.
item.author: Hamish Gordon, Paul Paul, Steve, . Mohit, Daniel, Adrian Adrian, : Ben, Annette, Masaru, Ken Ken

Vogel, Yuri Stozhkov, António Tomé, Nsikanabasi Silas Umo, Franziska Vogel, R. J. Wagner, Dongyu Wang, Stefan K. Weber, André Welti, Yusheng Wu, Marcel Zauner-Wieczorek, Mikko Sipilä, Paul M. Winkler, Armin Hansel, Urs Baltensperger, Markku Kulmala, Richard C. Flagan, Joachim Curtius, Ilona Riipinen, Hamish Gordon, Jos Lelieveld, Imad El Haddad, Rainer Volkamer, Douglas R. Worsnop, T. Christoudias, J. Kirkby, Ottmar Möhler, Neil M. Donahue, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2022. https://openalex.org/W4393531939
Data presented in the manuscript "Synergistic HNO3–H2SO4–NH3 upper tropospheric particle formation" currently in review. The manuscript associated with this data was written using results from the CLOUD experiment at CERN, and the author list is a subset of the CLOUD collaboration.
